SHIP_TO_CUSTOMER_ID = #{shipToCustomerId,jdbcType=CHAR},

CS_TAX_CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{csTaxClassificationId,jdbcType=CHAR},
DIRECT_SETTLEMENT_INDICATOR = #{directSettlementIndicator,jdbcType=BIT},
DIRECT_INVOICING_INDICATOR = #{directInvoicingIndicator,jdbcType=BIT},
CASH_SETTLEMENT_INDICATOR = #{cashSettlementIndicator,jdbcType=BIT},
CRM_TRACK_STATUS = #{crmTrackStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
BRAND = #{brand,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
DESTINATION = #{destination,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
SHIPPING_PORT = #{shippingPort,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
AIR_PORT = #{airPort,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
AGENT_CUSTOMER_ID = #{agentCustomerId,jdbcType=CHAR},
BROKERS_SUPPLIER_ID = #{brokersSupplierId,jdbcType=CHAR},
INSPECTION_SUPPLIER_ID = #{inspectionSupplierId,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMMISSION_RATE = #{commissionRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSURANCE_RATE = #{insuranceRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRANSPORT_SUPPLIER_ID = #{transportSupplierId,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRICE_TERMS_ID = #{priceTermsId,jdbcType=CHAR},
TAX_MODE = #{taxMode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
TAX_ID = #{taxId,jdbcType=CHAR},
UDF001 = #{udf001,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UDF002 = #{udf002,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UDF003 = #{udf003,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UDF011 = #{udf011,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

UDF013 = #{udf013,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

UDF024 = #{udf024,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UDF025 = #{udf025,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UDF026 = #{udf026,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UDF041 = #{udf041,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UDF042 = #{udf042,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UDF051 = #{udf051,jdbcType=CHAR},
UDF052 = #{udf052,jdbcType=CHAR},
UDF053 = #{udf053,jdbcType=CHAR},
UDF054 = #{udf054,jdbcType=CHAR},
ApproveStatus = #{approvestatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ApproveDate = #{approvedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ApproveBy = #{approveby,jdbcType=CHAR},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LastModifiedDate = #{lastmodifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ModifiedDate = #{modifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateBy = #{createby,jdbcType=CHAR},
LastModifiedBy = #{lastmodifiedby,jdbcType=CHAR},
ModifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=CHAR},
ProcessInstanceId = #{processinstanceid,jdbcType=CHAR},
Owner_Org_RTK = #{ownerOrgRtk,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
Owner_Org_ROid = #{ownerOrgRoid,jdbcType=CHAR},
Attachments = #{attachments,jdbcType=LONGNVARCHAR},
Version = #{version,jdbcType=BINARY},
where CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_ID = #{customerBusinessId,jdbcType=CHAR}
